website_summaries.verdict: This rashguard provides excellent sun protection with some fashionable details that make the fit adjustable to your needs.
pros: Half-zip top lets you ventilate when it gets warm
Side ties and ruching allow you to adjust the torso length
cons: Thin fabric doesn't work for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Long in length and arms
customer_reviews.text: So far so good in fit. I am 5'10" and wear size 12/14. I bought the coral in XL and love this. I have a ridiculously hard time finding items long enough for my arms and covering my torso. This fit me where "normal" length dresses normally do. The drawstrings go all the way to the bust so if it is too long, it could be shortened. I will be taking this on a cruise where I plan on keeping my pale skin unburned as a swimsuit cover. I will see how it does in skin protection factor.
customer_reviews.author: lmpromptuTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Maternity/Postpartum/Nursing Friendly Rash Guard
customer_reviews.text: I am 6 months pregnant and going on a babymoon this week and this rash guard is perfect. I ordered 3 different maternity rash guards to try and this is the winner for sure. I love that I'll be able to adjust the sides to wear postpartum as well and it's nursing friendly! My skin has been really sun sensitive this pregnancy, not to mention I just feel more comfortable with more coverage so I'm super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jacs

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection in a cute tunic
customer_reviews.text: It really did protect me from the sun. It looks really cute and worked for kayaking as well as the beach. I like the ability to adjust the length with the ties on the side. As a melanoma survivor, I’ve been told to always consider UPF protective clothing. They’re typically extremely expensive, but this was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: RileyD

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect cross between a cover up dress and a sun/swim shirt. I normally wear a medium but noticed the size chart image that was posted with the other views and the sizing vs measurements seemed smaller than normal. I ordered a large because of that and the fit is perfect. The sleeve are a little long but will be good to cover the hands from too much sun. I love the way it converts from a dress length to a shirt length with the cinch straps. A perfect solution for someone who was just diagnosed with melanoma, but doesn't want to live in a dark cave.
customer_reviews.author: Cby

customer_reviews.title: Great slightly loose fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife, who is 5'6"/147 lbs and usually wears size 8 or 10. Size M is slightly loose fit on her, and the fit looks much like the fit on the model in the product photo. Neckline is higher than typical crewneck and does not seem too tight. She hopes to use this over a bikini top for sun protection while standup paddleboarding.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great for Swimming
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this top. I have a sun allergy (polymorphic light eruption), so I try to protect my arms from the sun whenever possible. I bought this to use on a rafting trip, and it was great! I've used it every time I go swimming now. It dries quickly, and water doesn't cling to it when you come out. It's lasted multiple uses, washes, and drying. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Clark

customer_reviews.title: Long, like a dress
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Large, for a looser fit. I am 5'7", 134 lbs., size 6 pants, 36B. I haven't swam in this and am not sure I will keep it yet. It is so long, fits like a dress or extremely long tunic! I know you can shorten it with the strings, but still...it's very strange, being that long. I think it would work as a cover up quite nicely. They did post the length of these things in their size charts, I guess I missed that. Seems of good quality, though.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Too much material to wear as a shirt, more like a dress
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of a rash guard with the zippered v neck but I wasn't thrilled about the rouched sides. I'm normally a size M (5'3" 145 lbs) but ordered up a size based on other reviews. It was way too big. It was almost to knees at full length and when pulled up to waist/hip height there was just too much material gathered to be comfortable/flattering. It is nice quality but isn't going to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: jame.rame

customer_reviews.title: It ran large on me. I'm usually medium & ...
customer_reviews.text: It ran large on me. I'm usually medium & I lost my window for returning it. It does the work though! UPDATE: Like I said previously, the issue was that the size fitted me "bigger" but it did not affect the purpose of it. Company's customer service contacted me to offer me a new replacement for a smaller size. For this reason, because they cared about my concern I'm giving them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: It's light and very comfortable, even on a warm day in Texas
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shirt in a small to wear kayaking. It is definitely UV protective, I have a tan line on my forearms where I had pulled the sleeves up a little. It's light and very comfortable, even on a warm day in Texas. It's not skin tight, but doesn't hang on you like a sack either. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Buying one in every color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a few weeks ago for an upcoming beach trip and it has not disappointed. For reference I am a size 18 pre-pregnancy and am 5 months pregnant in this picture. This fits with plenty of room to grow. I probably could have ordered a size down. The top is very long, but the sides cinch up nicely. I have worn it daily on the beach for hours at a time and it has protected me from the sun perfectly. I want one in every color!
customer_reviews.author: kelleybelly

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This fits true to size chart. I usually wear a large, but I ordered XL because I like a looser fit. Love the drawstring sides. I have more weight in the middle. The sides can be adjusted to minimize the appearance of a fuller middle. I didn't burn and was in the water all day. Very soft and zipper didn't irritate my neck.
customer_reviews.author: ddllld

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fit, just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to the Caribbean, wanted something I could throw on to limit sun exposure and keep from burning. I was a little concerned, but this worked out great. I got the XXL and typically wear size 18 and it fit perfect. Snug, but not too tight. I like that I could pull it down longer to cover my tush while snorkeling because no matter how much sunscreen I put on I always get burnt right at the bathing suit line. It also comes up just right around the neck area to fully cover the chest. Highly recommend this piece.
customer_reviews.author: DominoJ

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this top/cover-up because I liked the idea of having versatility in the length. The color (coral), style, and quality were great. However, this did not work for me, as it was too long on my petite frame. When ruched, there was too much loose fabric and the shirt was still too long. The color, style, and quality was great.
customer_reviews.author: Richa A

customer_reviews.title: M fits true to size for once, but the Coral is NEON ORANGE, Too Bright!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" and 115 lbs. and this top fits perfectly in a M. The only thing I hate is that the "coral" is really Bright, Neon Orange. Construction zone orange. If you want to blind people, or pave roads, then order this bright orange color. Otherwise, stay away from it, it doesn't look as muted as the picture shows. I would guess the bright turquoise blue is the same - bright, bright, bright. I wanted this to wear with my kids to a large, sunny amusement park all day, and I want sun protection. Back this one goes. I don't want to blind everyone there.
customer_reviews.author: cute shoe girl

customer_reviews.title: Great beach cover- up
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I don't look like the model. But I love this top. It can double as a summer cover up. I am round around the middle. So I don't want something snug. Otherwise, It looks like I have a bowling ball under my shirt. I wanted something loose fitting that would go over my bathing suit and protect me from the Sun. I am an older woman so I don't want to show Too Much leg. The sleeves are long. But I can scrunch them up. I debated on the XL which might have been okay? But settled with the XXL and it is great. I normally wear a size 14. The fabric is like swimsuit material.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but weird shape and too long
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size medium in most tops and pants, but I ordered this in a size Large to be safe since I’m kind of busty (36-DD). The size Large is way too big. It hits at mid-thigh for me and when cinched-up, it’s way too much material. I’m not even sure a Medium would fit because it would probably still be too long, might fit in the waist, but might be too small in the bust for my shape. Usually when swimwear gets wet, it expands, making it even bigger. I had to return it. It’s a great idea, but it’s just too long for me at 5’5” and oddly proportioned.
customer_reviews.author: Easter Clan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! If intended as a swimsuit, expect to order at your typical size (SM or L). If for boating, expect to order a size up possibly. It would be fantastic for pregnancy and a bikini top underneath is a-maz-ing! Great support and versatility with awesome coverage. I had looked through and sifted to find this and was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Healthyhabits

customer_reviews.title: Runs VERY small
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a very nice swim shirt however it runs VERY small. Not just tight fitting for swimming but several sizes small. My daughter normally wears a small woman's shirt so in this, I bought a medium. It is skin tight and will not even wear it. She could have easily worn a large. So I would buy two sizes up from your normal size unless you want it to be skin tight.
customer_reviews.author: Keri M. Harty

customer_reviews.title: I love the length of the top
customer_reviews.text: I love the length of the top. I happen to be very Hippy so it do not fit loose around the waist, which what I was hoping for. I weigh 196 lbs. and I'm 5'6-3/4". I haven't tried it out in water/on the beach but the top is nice. I can't wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Thais

customer_reviews.title: Love this item and such a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swim shirt. I got an XL and it fit perfectly. I haven’t gone swimming in it yet, but this is perfect for my AZ trip when I’m in the sun swimming most of the vacation. I can’t wait to wear this swim shirt and such a good price for the item you get! Would buy more if I needed more swim shirts! Update: wore the swim shirt on the river and it was perfect. It protected me from the sun and I could still swim comfortably in it. Also, I got a lot of compliments on how cute the water shirt is. I got the XL and it didn’t shrink in the water. Very good product and price!
customer_reviews.author: steven g

customer_reviews.title: but my husband liked it. It is long
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a little small, but my husband liked it. It is long. Hangs below my butt and could probably be used as a dress by a shorter person. I am 5'' 8 in tall with very long legs. The sleeves were a perfect length for me, but I do have long arms and they were not tight at all. It is very well made and seems to be a very high quality material. Guess I should have given it 5 starts, but it is tight across the stomach area. Of course, that's not the top's fault, I just need to lose 25-40 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: TxLadyForLife

customer_reviews.title: but I like the looser fit of the hips
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have ordered a size small (32/27/38) but I’ll keep the medium. It fits a bit loose in the arms and the bust, but I like the looser fit of the hips. The material and construction seem to be of pretty good quality. It will be perfect for SUP and other beach activities!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will work.
customer_reviews.text: Just a tad bit snugger than I was expecting. I am usually a large, ordered and XL. Looks a bit snugger than on the model. I wanted it a bit looser to go over other things. Still works, just FYI. The material is thicker than I imagined. I hope it is cool enough on the beach. Will update to let you know. Love that it is long and adjustable as I am long waisted. Color is a bit more orange-y than this photo.
customer_reviews.author: sn

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: havent used this yet but will on our Mexico trip coming up. I ordered up a size large and had to send it back. Too big. Ordered medium fits snug but not too snug. It’s a rash guard it’s suppose to be snug if you go in the water. 5’6’ 145 pounds. Cute, nice material
customer_reviews.author: T. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love it, super comfy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This top is so comfortable and long! I'm 5'9" and sent back other options before trying this one. It's perfect. You can cinch it up to be much shorter and it looks so cute! So don't worry if you aren't super tall, it's meant to accommodate various torso lengths and I would have loved to own it during pregnancy. It's lightweight and stretchy, not suffocating and feels breathable. But I didn't burn at all. It definitely protects. I'm so pale and burn fast. We were out from 10 am - 4pm. I'm so happy with this swim top. I got the Large. I have sorta wide shoulders I guess, average bust, 150 lbs. Sorry there's not a better pic!
customer_reviews.author: A. Aln.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i need
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality especially for the price. I wear them with swim leggings as a halal swimsuit (I wear a hijab) and they cover everything. I have this top in both coral and light blue and I love them! I always recommend them to anyone I know looking for a modest swim top
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: You can easily burn wearing this!
customer_reviews.text: Two issues. 1. When I pulled on the strings on the side of the garment I exposed some pretty crappy workmanship. The strings weren’t in one piece. See photo. 2. I BURNED through the shirt in UNDER 2 HOURS. A friend with more experience with sun proof shirts said to send her a pic of the fabric held up to window light. She said OMG you are so lucky you didn’t burn worse, that is thin AF. Save yourself some money and go with the brand Solumbra. Expensive but it actually works.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: this is a really great top!
customer_reviews.text: I got this shirt to wear for golf - tried it out for the first time on Sunday. It is fantastic! I'm pretty short (5' 2") and was concerned that the length would be too long. Without pulling up the drawstrings on the sides, the shirt is in fact way too long. But I expected that based on the photos. BUT, once I got the sides cinched up it was the perfect length and very flattering on the stomach area. The only thing I didn't love were the sleeves were a little long, but that is the case with just about any shirt for me :) I continue to be impressed by Baleaf products, both price and quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B

customer_reviews.title: Little small but still cute.
customer_reviews.text: It fits quite small. It's long enough to wear as a dress but being so tight on me it doesn't look good worn that way. I generally wear a large to x-large. I ordered an XL. When I wear it just as a shirt though it doesn't look bad. I don't mind it being tight as a shirt. The seller has excellent customer service and reached out to me to make sure I was happy with the product even though it was tight. They were very kind and I very much appreciate good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shirt; fit depends on your preference
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" 112lbs. I want a shirt that's more loose fitting so the small I ordered was too tight for my purposes. I want these shirts primarily for walking to prevent sun exposure. It feels great and was a lovely color. It just didn't suit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover Up
customer_reviews.text: I went up in size because of other reviews - I say order your normal size and if you want a slim fit go down a size even. Mine is baggy because I went up in size. I would say this is designed to fit a taller woman. It is a good cover up but still need a swim suit underneath or a bra. I felt protected with the shirt on but definitely still need sunscreen. Eventually I could feel the warmth of the sun. I am petite so the length of the arms are too long for me and I pushed them up but like having the coverage. I'm happy with my purchase and did not get burned.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: The material is good and I liked the zipper part but it was ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is good and I liked the zipper part but it was different from what I expected so I returned it. I was looking for a rash guard for beach or waterpark so I don't need to worry about putting sunscreen on my top but this was way too long and heavy. I am 5' and 110lb and it came down to my thigh. I could adjust the length with the strings on the side but then the bottom of the shirt became thick and heavy. I wanted something I could pup on top of my swimsuit but this was more like a robe.
customer_reviews.author: H. Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Good job keeping you warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought the white in xs. I usually wear an xs and fits as expected. It’s not skintight. You can see the swimsuit under the white.
customer_reviews.author: kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Nice swim shirt but arrived with a stain :(
customer_reviews.text: This top is very attractive. The coral color is pretty. I like the fact you can wear it like a tunic or cinch it shorter. I am usually a small but in this top the shoulders were tight thus I exchanged for a medium. I do have broad shoulders (5’ 6” 125 lbs.). Unfortunately when I received it I did notice a few whitish spots on the front but I figured it was packaging dust or packaging residue. I packed it for my Aruba beach trip and the spots did not disappear after I washed it. If I had not already worn it, I would have returned. If it arrived with no discoloration I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: sandman

customer_reviews.title: Great loose fitting swim shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swim top! I was looking for a loose fitting top and really was surprised with how comfortable I felt in this. I’m extremely insecure and no matter what suit I wear, I feel self conscious. The whole time I’m supposed to be having fun I’m focusing on what I look like. With this shirt I have confidence! I love it. I was able to float the river with a group of friends and not think once about what I was wearing. It is not at all see through when it’s wet and I love the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a swimsuit, not like regular clothes
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a Medium. I bought an XL because I will in my third trimester this summer and wanted to make sure I had more than enough growing room. It fits very loose, even in the arms, but the arms fit more like a comfortable large or snug XL. In my experience, swimsuits always seem to run smaller than normal clothes sizes, and I think this shirt does that as well. I love it though! It looks super cute! I will probably get a Medium when I am back down to that size again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The fit on this shirt is great. I did order up a size based on other reviews and glad I did as it fits perfect. Not so skin tight but tight enough to be appropriate for swimming. Absolutely love the long length and ability to cinch up the sides to help cover up a little bulge. The coral color is nice and vibrant. Another feature I really like is the zip front. I typically do not like shirts to come around my neck so this gives me a little breathing room but can zip up under bright sun. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find plus size rash guard top
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the product yet, but out of the package it appears very well made. Nice and silky smooth. I am glad the company offers such a big selection of extra large plus sized swimwear and am excited that I found something I can wear! However, the sizing is confusing. These tops are mostly made for straight bodies, not pear shaped. I ordered mine 2 sizes larger than my usual size and am happy with the fit. The cut is very nice and there aren't shoulder seams so it isn't obvious the top is oversized.
customer_reviews.author: DCM

customer_reviews.title: A great rashgard swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: A great rashgard swim shirt, the martial is high quality and thick that difinatley protects your skin from the sun burn, the only downside is that size runs big, I am 5”2’, 150lb, the M is pretty loose on me, have to return it to get S instead. Hope my tip would help you out...
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Works a modest swim dress with bottoms and sports bra.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a modest swimsuit option. I wear it with bottoms and a sports bra. I felt very comfortable at the beach this year with the coverage this provided.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wears great! I'm 5'-4" and the Hem is just above my knees. Looks nice enough to wear around the party or resort as a dress before jumping in the water. Only my black bathing suit shows through the light blue dress a little. My white or blue suit doesn't show through the light blue dress at all. Looks convincing like a shirt when cinched up. Dries very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Nice swimshirt
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this swimshirt because I liked the zipper which makes it easier to take on and off and also for the adjustable sides. I ordered a medium because I do not like things suctioned to me. I usually wear a small shirt but I did not want the sleeves to be super tight. The medium is a little big but because it’s adjustable it will work fine. I am also pregnant so the adjustable sides will allow me to wear this during pregnancy too. The material seems nice and it’s a fraction of the cost of many other swimshirts.
customer_reviews.author: KCK

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect addition to a day on the river, or any water for that matter. It keeps me from getting burned, wicks away the water super fast. It's super cute. Can be adjusted at the side to be either longer like a short dress/cover up, or cinched and tied to be more like a top. I wear it both ways with my board shorts from the same fabric so I can be at the lake all day, never burn, not too hot nor chilly when we're on the boat and I'm drenched. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: mARGARET hARDAWAY

customer_reviews.title: Great company, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great company, excellent product. I ordered this shirt for my daughter, and ordered the wrong size by mistake. The company went well above and beyond by sending me a correct size well after the 30-day guarantee. They really do stand by their apparel and work to satisfy customers. ... Oh and she loves the shirt - it's well made and fits perfectly now that she has the correct size. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: XCKD

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and cool - exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt I was pleased with fabric and the look . But then I was sooooooooo happy with purchase and the quality when I actually wore and washed this . I got the royal blue and it looks great on! It fits a bit smaller so I got an XL so it could be loose. It’s easy to tighten with the side ties and it’s sooo cute. That fabric also is very cool when it’s drying on once you exit the pool or ocean. No sunburns. I bought it both to protect my skin and to cover up post baby weight. I bought another brand and this one is better by far. I plan to purchase another color!
customer_reviews.author: Andrés &  Mari

customer_reviews.title: I love how this can be as short or as long ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how this can be as short or as long as I want...it's very lightweight...I wore it yesterday on a 30 mile bike ride in 80 degree weather and didn't sweat at all. the zipper comes up just high enough but not so high that you feel that choking feeling that full zip items sometimes make me feel. i just wish it had a zipper pocket in the back of it for id, keys, chap-stick, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Todd

customer_reviews.title: Lovely for hiding my tummy
customer_reviews.text: I like these because if feel like it ruffles over my tummy and hides it some! intitially I thought it was too long but you just pull up the drawstrings! It just makes me feel more comfortable in the water and I am in the water all day. Only negative feedback is I follow the care instructions and the labels always peel off which looks a bit rubbish but I get great protection from these, I can roll the sleeves up and down. I will definitely purchase more! I have a blue and an orange one.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy G.

customer_reviews.title: Like and dislike
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2x and it looks great dry, but wet it holds a lot of water inside sleeves. This is just noticeably annoying when swimming. I liked the warmth in an indoor pool. Normally I’m freezing. I liked the modest look over my swimsuit. But I think I will look for a print with 3/4 sleeves instead .
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 in 1!
customer_reviews.text: Have yet yo use this but so far am loving the style and fit. Size is as expected and I was happy the sleeves werent too tight. it is so cute and can be worn as a dress like cover up or you can ruche and tie the sides as more of a shirt. It is said to be spf 50 and am hoping it gives good protection at the beach. the material is not too heavy so I still think ill be cool even in the long sleeves. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: brelli

customer_reviews.title: One of them has QC issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these shirts for a cruise trip to mexico. Upon opening the package, I had to return one of them right away, because I found the zip did not work well and saw a few threads came out from it. But I decided to keep the other, because I like its soft fabric and it seems to dry very quickly. I could worn it in many styles. The reason that I give it 3 stars is the armpit seam was torn on my 4th use. Overall it is okay for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Too small AND too big
customer_reviews.text: Based on comments, I ordered a large. (I go back and forth between medium and large, depending on the style.). Very tight in the boobs, and I am only a B cup. Very loose in the belly area when worn as a shirt, just OK when worn as a (very short) dress. The arms were a bit snug as well--not uncomfortable in temperate weather, but in hot weather that snugness would be too warm for me. Returned it, so I can't comment on durability, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems good quality so far based on stitching, zipper, finishing etc. Nice dark blue color. Bit snug on me but I was expecting that based on the description - I usually wear plus size 20/22 tops and 24 bottoms. I'm 5'6, at full length it hits almost mid-thigh which is what I wanted. I have proportionally plump arms but sleeves aren't tight. They are ridiculously long tho and I have longish arms. I was planning to shorten them to elbow length anyway, so not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jane D'oh

customer_reviews.title: Love this company’s products!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. I have 2 of these now. The only thing I wish was that the seam along the breast area was lower. If you are busty that seam may hit a little higher than you would like. I really like side draw strings as you can shorten the top or wear it longer for walks on the beach. You need a swim top or swim bra underneath so make sure you get one if you plan to wear this in the water. I have several things from this company and I love/like them all.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item.  A bit heavy, but a great shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I purposefully bought a size larger than I normally wear because I wanted a looser fit. This shirt is a great rash guard, and kept me from getting sunburned at the water park (where I always get roasted). The one downfall I have to say about it is that it is kinda heavy. It was fine at the waterpark, but at the beach in south Florida in the middle of summer (crazy hot and humid as the Amazon rainforest) it was too heavy to be comfortable, I had to take it off. In a less humid environment it'll be fine. It's true to size, but I ordered up on purpose. I appreciated the looser fit.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my wife warm in the pool
customer_reviews.text: My wife like the way this swim dress looks on her, and loves the fact that she can now swim in at our fitness club without feeling chilled. Correction... she could swim there - until they closed to enforce social distancing. <sigh> This too will pass, and I'm sure she'll get a little smile every time she puts it on once they open the doors again. In the meanwhile, we'll just put lawn chairs under the sprinkler on hot days :)
customer_reviews.author: Hydroace

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the XL by going off other reviews but it was way to big. I'm 5'6" 175lbs 38D pear shape with a bit of a belly. I exchanged the XL for the L and the fit was perfect. High quality fabric and stitching, long sleeves covered the hands if needed. Super comfy and stretchy so it was easy to get on and off. I wore it for 4 days in the ocean, easy to swim in, doesn't ride up and not once did I get a sun burn. The color is beautiful and never faded.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. I loved the style and how you could ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. I loved the style and how you could use the strings on the side to make the cover longer or shorter. Its pretty long on me with the ties undone, I looks like a short dress. I bought it for our vacation to Mexico to help shield me from the sun while snorkeling. The material is pretty thick but it kept me pretty cool. Overall a good buy and would definitely buy more in another color for future vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake121

customer_reviews.title: Size up if you have wider shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I like this top. I am 5'7"ish and 190 lbs. I got an XL, and it is fitted and slightly loose around the middle. However, I am a lifter, and I have wide shoulders, so I sized up so that my broad upper body would be comfortable. The only complaint I have is that the material was heavier than I was expecting. BUT - I plan on wearing it while paddling, so I can always cool off in the water if need be. I will likely buy similar products from Baleaf again - they have good products for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: ABBrown23

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't really make this look good as either a dress or a top, but didn't matter cause it was REALLY heavy and was THICK material. This would NOT be a quick dry top, which is essential for wearing all day at the pool or beach. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size larger!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this swim rash guard. I've never had one before but need it for the Arizona sun. I bought a size larger than I would normally buy and it fits nicely. I like things to fit a bit on the looser side and the size larger does just that. It's long but the ties on the side bring it up perfectly. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: KAF

customer_reviews.title: Not full zipper.
customer_reviews.text: This was very big. Also, I didn’t like having to put it on over my head. I think it is more convenient to have a rash guard shirt that has a zipper all the way.
customer_reviews.author: MissT

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. XL fits like a Large. Returning :(
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 3", 180lbs. I have a very large chest (38H) and wear an XL consistently in everything from shirts to dresses to bathing suit tops. The bust in this shirt fit fine, but the middle where my round stomach is was too tight for my comfort. Even with the ruching on the sides you can get from pulling the adjustable strings for length -- it was just too tight. You could see the outline of my belly button which is just NOT a good look. I'm sending it back and hoping for a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great color, loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for 3 weeks in the bahamas. Awesome for the days I was too lazy to put sunscreen on or didn't want to keep reapplying. LOVED that I could pull the strings to make it shorter. The ruching that happens is very flattering. Also the color was my absolute favorite. The sleeves were kind of weirdly long. But not annoying. I got it q size larger than normal this way it fit comfortably and not super tight. And I could put another swimsuit top underneath. Also does not have a built in bra of any kind. I wore a sports bra when I wore it
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: too warm, a bit long
customer_reviews.text: The shirt itself is nice looking and the drawstrings on the sides allows you to choose the style you want. I barely used it on my trip though because it kept me too warm. It isn't very breathable. While it wasn't the easiest shirt to put on, it fit ok. The length is too long for my liking. It went too far down even with the draw strings. Size M 5"4' 130lbs, muscular
customer_reviews.author: AL2NY

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is really strange.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fabric & style of this rashguard. The drawstrings add some cute shape to it! The sizing is really strange though. First I bought a M, but I could barely get it on because it was so tight. I decided to try a L, but it was huge & baggy on me—even with adjusting the drawstrings. I really wanted to like this shirt, but the sizing was so bad that I couldn’t use it :(
customer_reviews.author: JFerg

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the XL because of the reviews saying the product ran small. In my opinion it is true to size. I'm 5'5" 180 lbs usually wear a 12-14 and large shirt. This was a little big but I'm ok with that I don't like skin tight clothing but will see what it's like when it's wet, may be to baggy. Other than that super cute and well made. I like it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso U. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this over my bathing suit! I love that it offers the versatility of wearing it as a coverup/dress or as a shirt. It is super comfortable, not overly tight and suffocating. I typically wear a women’s size 12 or 14 and the XL was perfect. I even got compliments the first time wearing it! The turquoise color was also very vibrant and summery. I would definitely buy this again, probably next year in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I wish this had a higher neckline to avoid burning the back of my neck. Otherwise this worked great and was comfortable when I was snorkeling in the water. The material feels nice and thick and the seams are well made. I'm about 5'10" ~180lbs and I got the large.
customer_reviews.author: Emryn1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for skin cover
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a 90* amusement park day. Cool and breezy, but covered my skin from the sun. Shared the link to quite a few people as they thought it was genius to wear something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Fallers Wife

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me
customer_reviews.text: I got this in a size 'small' as a cover-up for a trip to Hawaii while 4-months pregnant - it was WAY too small for me. I ended up giving it to my sister-in-law who was on the trip with us, and it fit her perfectly. She loved it and continued to wear it all summer. She's tall and about 115 lbs and not pregnant, so if you are about that size, it might work well for you!
customer_reviews.author: Meggowatt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Buy your normal top size.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear tops that are either M or L depending on cut/material. Usually I know swim suits run small so I bought this top in XL but I was swimming in this top (pun intended) I'm just frustrated that manufacturers can't stick to the same sizing. Other than the wrong size, the quality looks GREAT, it's also very nice and LONG. I decided to buy again in sizes M and L so that I can try both and see which is best... XL is going back. I recommend you buy what is true to your size. I am 5'7, 153 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pear shapes and other shapes too!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. I am a pear shape with hips that are a little larger. I had a hard time finding a rash guard or “rashie” that didn’t make me look booger than I am, Or hug me too tight in my hips. This was perfect! My other concern, I thought it would end up being too hot and of course it’s still long sleeves but it was breathable. I love that you can make it shorter or longer, so I was able to wear it with my swim shorts or a skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice Swim Tunic
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of anything I can use to be out swimming without getting burnt to a crisp. I purchased the short sleeve version in the XXL. It is a slim fit, so its pretty snug on the belly. Had I bought any color than black, I don't think it would have been as flattering. I plan to wear over my tankini as an additional cover when out snorkeling or hanging on a floaty.
customer_reviews.author: MosierGirl2

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Red hair and sun sensitive - need to always be covered up. This shirt fits perfectly and works perfectly! Just like the picture. Unfortunately, it's not very breathable, so unless you're actually planning on getting wet, it'll be too hot to wear on summer days. I bought white because I thought it would be cooler, but the fabric is just too protective to be cool. Looking forward to wearing it in cooler weather.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. But one size up when you order!
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great rash guard which serves multi purposes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rash guard. I bought one this year for the first time before heading back to Galveston, because I knew we would be there for 4 days. The top is a bit snug as others posted, but I would much rather that than it be loose. It is long (like a very short mini skirt) if the strings are loosened, but I like that option, because it becomes a nice cover up. But when the strings are tightened, it fits nicely as a shirt. I am 4'11' so I can say this with confidence! Bright color, held up in the wash, and I like the front zipper. It's exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: KK DALLAS

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks good, and is comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rash guard! I was worried about finding one that was going to fit and be long enough, as I am not exactly a tiny person. I got an XXL to be on the safe side and it's perfect. I like that the length is really adjustable and I have to option to unzip the neck to put the shirt on/take it off. It is also really versatile in that it will look good over a swimsuit, but also with shorts. The quality is great for the price, and I'll be wearing it a lot, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Nice smooth, soft
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth, soft, thick material that is still surprisingly cool when the temp is in the mid to upper 80s anyway. Its a little snug in the chest area but good otherwise. I'd buy another just one size up.
customer_reviews.author: SuperW

customer_reviews.title: Versatile sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I am on an antibiotic for a month that causes sun sensitivity, even brief exposure causes an itchy rash. It works great and the extra long sleeves are perfect to help shield my hands. I only wish they had thumb holes. It is slightly snug on me in the waist but otherwise true to size. I like that I can ruch the sides to wear with a swim skirt, or leave it long to wear with leggings. Being pear shaped I was concerned that it would be tight on my hips, but it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Meesha

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, love the color!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for white water rafting. I carry a lot of weight in my belly. The xxl had plenty of length. It had a slim fit but that’s to be expected for a swim shirt. Loved the color too! Washed up beautifully and then I hung it to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Annie S

customer_reviews.title: Long enough for taller people, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Just great - I haven't sun burned at all through it and it covers up my flab really nicely! I'm 5'8" and have a hard time finding shirts/tops that are long enough but this one covers half my butt! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear small to medium and got medium just in case I needed a some wiggle room. Worked out great. The length is adjustable on both sides. Great coverage and protection from sun - wore it in Hawaii, didn’t apply sunblock on upper body, and didn’t get sunburnt or even tan at all! Great alternative to Coolibar and more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth kc wang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for second trimester maternity wear
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2" and normally where a size Medium, I bought a Large and glad I did. It allows room for my belly. The arm length is a tad bit too long, but not super noticeable. I like that this sun guard has a zipper at the neck, it's more feminine than my full length snorkeling rash guards from the past. The side ties work great to accentuate my baby bump. I used this the first opening day at the waterslides, and all the men in our family got BURNED, I did not :)
customer_reviews.author: Allie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt before going to Mexico. We have a high risk of sun cancer in our family. The shirt worked great. I was afraid I'd be hot in it but wasn't at all. I was totally protected from the sun. I would highly recommend this shirt. I bought this for both my daughter and me and ended up buying several.
customer_reviews.author: Dolmanet

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: My wife doesn't go on the boat without wearing it. Can be worn with shorts or pulled down like a dress for covering up if she is going into a store. Dries quickly if gets wet or if worn into the water. All the other wives in our group have asked where they could get one. The first one had held up great through last summer and bought a second one of a different color for mother's day this year
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Z.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Issues
customer_reviews.text: Good material/quality as far as I can tell; however, I ordered the XL (sizing down from what the chart even suggested) and it was VERY BAGGY. Yes, baggy. Fit like a very loose dress and made me look pregnant. Very unflattering. If you can find a size that fits, I think it would work. But, like most women's clothing, size charts don't reflect accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt! Bought a small when I'm usually a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt! Bought a small when I'm usually a medium (wide shoulders) and it fit great. Protected me great on both kayaking and boating. Bought another two in different colors. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering and adjustable fit
customer_reviews.text: I love this swim top. I also have the long sleeve version of it but wanted the option to have short sleeves too. It is great for hiding your stomach and has a very flattering shape because you can control how much to pull the strings and runch up the sides. Would highly recommend. Quality seems great so far as well after multiple wears and washes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: 5'4 and 127 lbs 34c...so I ordered small because I wanted it to be form fitting. Very forgiving in the midsection as I'd hoped and suctions to my upper arms and back as I wanted. More see-through than I expected but it's an overshirt after all. Beautiful color too. Overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ReadWriteRepeat

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shirt for avoiding sunburn. The zipper makes it easy to put on and as there is a zipper guard, it is comfortable. I like that the sleeves are long enough to cover the tops of my hands. The shirt is long enough to cover the tops of my legs, and the draw strings are cute. I am 5'4" at 122 pounds and the medium size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a pinch, after going for my first tattoo and finding out I had to stay out of the sun for the next 6 weeks and Summer vacation was just about to start. I love how you can scrunch it up on the sides, ro make it a little more attractive because it's super long otherwise. It's comfy and easy to get on and off. I've had a bunch of compliments too.
customer_reviews.author: GirlMomB

customer_reviews.title: Love this shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for sun protection in Turks and Caicos and wore it nearly every day. Light weight, dries quickly, good cover-up- I did not burn once! I'm tall with absurdly long arms and usually have trouble finding clothes that fit, but I absolutely love the fit of this shirt. The sleeves are perfect and the long trunk offers really great coverage for my "momma belly".
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Great for maternity!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use while pregnant because of the ruched sides, and it works perfectly as a maternity swim top/rash guard. Worn it several times now at the pool, the beach, carnival, theme park, splash pad, etc. Fits great around my belly (5 months pregnant now) with lots of space to adjust the size with the side ties.
customer_reviews.author: Jennell

customer_reviews.title: ordered wrong
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other shirt for my wife before and they arrived and fit great. this shirt is to fit over a swimsuit and was too small. I should have ordered a larger size. My bad. I did order the larger size and it should arrive today. No problem in returning this item. As far as I'm concern dealing with this seller is great. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the material. I am an XL and I ordered a XXL because I wanted it lose like a beach cover-up, but it is still a little tight on the hips, so if you have big hips don't expect it to be too lose when you wear it longer. I still love it. I is very comfortable and definitely protects me from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa Roche

customer_reviews.title: Great product for maternity
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I bought this at 6 months pregnant to wear at the beach and it fit perfectly. I can see it fitting for a bit longer because of the stretchiness and the side ties, and I'm hopeful that it will still fit postpartum once again because of the side ties! I bought a swim bra to wear under it because there's no built in padding and that worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Winn

customer_reviews.title: Great swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: Buying swimwear is always a gamble! I purchased XL after reading the reviews (I usually size up one size from my usual dress size). I’m a size large in regular clothing, size 10 jeans, 36DD. Love the adjustable sides of this shirt...gives a flattering gathered look camouflaging the midsection without looking sloppy. Sleeves were the perfect length. Love the covered zipper. Glad I took the plunge and got this! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: JKM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Seams ripped and fabric snagged within 1 use, this shirt seems VERY cheaply made. Fit is irregular: true to size at chest/shoulders, loose at waist, VERY loose in arms. Sleeves are extra long and shirt is extra long as other reviewers have noted. The ties for the ruched sides do not stay tied in the water and easily slip out. This rashguard is not at all worth the price. Giving it 2 stars because at least I didn't get sunburned!
customer_reviews.author: HLS

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Color was as advertised. I am 32 weeks pregnant and weighing 166 lbs M size still fits well. There is still Enough room for growing belly. After several washes writings came off. It doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

product_meta.title: BALEAF Women's Long Sleeve Half-Zip Sun Protection Rashguard Side Adjustable Swim Shirt
feature_bullets: SUN PROTECTION:Womens swim shirt with UPF 50+ features blocks sun's harmful rays.
TWO STYLE:Adjustable tie ruching side perfect for customer ideal length dress or shirt wearing.
Womens rash guard,quick-drying,soft,sleek, lightweight and breathable fabric.
Chest zipper with pull for easy on and off, and the zipper garage protects your neck from chafing.
Swim shirt top suits for surfing,diving,pool party,vacation,casual or as a cover-up on the beach.
